product_name: Marmot Gravity Soft-Shell Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Using windproof fabric to take the bite out of cold-weather breezes, the men's Marmot Gravity soft-shell jacket is tough enough for harsh winter conditions, yet comfortable enough to wear every day. 4-way stretch, soft-shell fabric is bonded to a polyester microfleece lining for water resistance, abrasion resistance and easy mobility. Full-length draft flap backs the front zipper to keep cold air out; collar and chin guard are lined with soft, moisture-wicking DriClime(R) fabric. Adjustable cuffs and drawcord hem seal in body heat. Marmot Gravity jacket for men features zip hand pockets, a zip sleeve pocket and an internal stash pocket. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow a full range of arm motion and prevent jacket from riding up when arms are raised. Closeout.
